application_description.message: This plugin will call a selected number by clicking the right mouse button.

no_serverip.message: Please enter the ip address or domain of your ansitel pbx. You will find this option under Addons > Extensions > ansitel Click-to-Dial > Preferences of your Mozilla Thunderbird.

no_token.message: Please enter the click to dial token of your ansitel user. You will find this option under Addons > Extensions > ansitel Click-to-Dial > Preferences of your Mozilla Thunderbird.

no_peer.message: Please enter the account name of your ansitel peer or a dialplan number. You will find this option under Addons > Extensions > ansitel Click-to-Dial > Preferences of your Mozilla Thunderbird.
